result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 11 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} ##### **In Class Discussion of Huggler et al. 2022, led by Jeremy Alder and Becca Windell** ##### **In Class Discussion of Wittemyer et al. 2019.pdf** #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Background Reading (not required): - Nathan et al 2008 - Foundational bit of science - Nathan et al. 2022 - Big data science - Signer et al 2018 - amt R package - Calabrese et al. 2016 - ctmm R packageguide - Silva et al. 2021 - autocorrelated kernel density (AKDE) home range review - McClintock et al. 2018 - momentuHMM R package - Background Videos (not required): - Movement Ecology Th√©o Michelot. February 7, 2022; Code - Intro. Animal Movement Ecology - Josh Cullen - Background Resources (not required): - Animove Resources - Continuous-time movement modeling ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Downloads: Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("amt","tidygraph","ctmm","ggraph")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Smith et al. 2022.pdf - Northrup et al. 2022 (Intro through 'How are selection functions fit?')
